title: Lag spikes with 60 ping
body: just as i said when i have consistently 60 ping my game just slows down and speeds up for no reason, the characters i contol instead of taking sharp and precise turns when i command them to they just start tokyo drifting so the game is like if i had 200-250 ping but it shows 60 and in other online games i dont have this problem pls patch EUNE

replies.body: Tokyo drifting?  Were it a different situation, that actually sounds neat.  ><  Sorry about these issues, though!  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the matches you're experiencing in, which should give us a good overview of your specific issue.  Let me know what you find out and we can go from there.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1PbkA07M,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-17T19:18:37.073+0000)
>
> Tokyo drifting?  Were it a different situation, that actually sounds neat.  ><  Sorry about these issues, though!  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the matches you're experiencing in, which should give us a good overview of your specific issue.  Let me know what you find out and we can go from there.

so i did the log report

99/100 
Avg Latency	69.93 ms
Avg Packet Loss	28.43%
Avg Jitter	4.17 ms

idk, i never have connection problems in league of legends but today in the 2 games i did i had the same problem described by OP

Heres a comparison to the last 30 days

Ethernet	89/100
Latency 55 ms
Packet Loss 0.27%
Jitter	1 ms
Games	113

Damn, that packet loss really escalated.  Try out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network and test it in a custom game.  That should help fix things up, but let me know if there are still problems.
Same problem, yesterday was fine tho
